description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget 'AdminMenuManagementScreen' that provides an administrative interface for managing menu items in a food ordering platform. It includes UI components for displaying, adding, editing, toggling availability, and removing menu items, along with associated helper classes for layout and item representation.

classes.name: AdminMenuManagementScreen
classes.description: Main widget for the admin menu management interface, including layout and access control.

classes.name: _MenuGrid
classes.description: A grid layout for displaying menu items.

classes.name: _MenuCard
classes.description: A card widget representing a single menu item with controls.

classes.name: _Item
classes.description: A simple widget displaying a message or placeholder.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for AdminMenuManagementScreen, including header, menu list, and controls.

methods.name: _MenuGrid.build
methods.description: Builds a grid view of menu item cards.

methods.name: _MenuCard.build
methods.description: Constructs UI for an individual menu item, including name, description, categories, price, availability and action buttons.

methods.name: _Item.build
methods.description: Builds a simple container with an icon and text, used as a placeholder.
